name: Sumer
description: A new type of digital board game where strategic planning and swift platforming meet. As nobles vying for power in a mysterious ancient civilization, players harvest resources and bid in real-time auctions in a contest to worship the almighty goddess Inanna!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 9, 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Good Storage: 1 GB available space
